places_to_visit.name: Pyramids of Giza
places_to_visit.description: The Pyramids of Giza are one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Visitors can explore the Great Pyramid, the Sphinx, and the surrounding pyramids, including those of Khafre and Menkaure. The site offers a glimpse into ancient Egyptian engineering and tombs.

places_to_visit.name: Egyptian Museum
places_to_visit.description: The Egyptian Museum in Cairo houses an extensive collection of ancient Egyptian artifacts, including the treasures of Tutankhamun, mummies, and various statues and inscriptions from pharaonic times.

places_to_visit.name: Coptic Cairo
places_to_visit.description: Coptic Cairo is a historic area with significant Christian sites, including the Hanging Church, the Coptic Museum, and the Church of St. Sergius and Bacchus. It offers a glimpse into the early Christian history of Egypt.

places_to_visit.name: Khan El Khalili Bazaar
places_to_visit.description: Khan El Khalili is a bustling market in Cairo, offering a wide range of souvenirs, spices, and traditional crafts. It's a great place to experience local culture and shop for unique items.

places_to_visit.name: Al-Azhar Mosque
places_to_visit.description: Al-Azhar Mosque is one of Cairo's oldest and most important mosques. It is a center of Islamic learning and features beautiful Islamic architecture and serene courtyards.
